meanings.sent1: The balloon floated in the air because it was unweighted.
meanings.sent2: The feather is unweighted and easily carried by the wind.
meanings.sent3: The unweighted cloud seemed to dance across the sky.
meanings.sent4: Her unweighted thoughts soared freely without any burden.
meanings.sent5: The unweighted paper airplane glided effortlessly through the room.

meanings.definition: Not influenced by weight or importance.
meanings.sent1: She made an unweighted decision based solely on her preferences.
meanings.sent2: The unweighted opinion of a child can sometimes be the most honest.
meanings.sent3: His unweighted response to the situation surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: The unweighted choice to wear mismatched socks showed her carefree spirit.
meanings.sent5: An unweighted heart knows only true feelings without any bias.

meanings.definition: Not adjusted or modified based on weight.
meanings.sent1: The unweighted average of the scores gave each test the same value.
meanings.sent2: In the unweighted ranking, every participant had an equal chance to win.
meanings.sent3: The unweighted scale made it difficult to distinguish the heavier objects.
meanings.sent4: The unweighted measurement system simplified the comparison process.
meanings.sent5: An unweighted decision-making process ensures fairness for all involved.
